data.title: Delaware State Police
data.meta_description: With an overall mission to reduce motor vehicle collisions, the Traffic Operations Section (TOS) performs an array of diverse functions. Led by Captain Matthew Cox and Lt. Tracy Condon, section personnel coordinate Divisional traffic enforcement while conducting statewide record-keeping. The section also provides proactive and reactive enforcement via our Commercial Vehicle Enforcement Unit (CVEU).​
data.meta_site_name: Delaware State Police - State of Delaware
data.text:
With an overall mission to reduce motor vehicle collisions, the Traffic Operations Section (TOS) performs an array of diverse functions. The section personnel coordinate Divisional traffic enforcement while conducting statewide record-keeping. The section also provides proactive and reactive enforcement via our Commercial Vehicle Enforcement Unit (CVEU).​

If you have questions regarding a traffic ticket you have received, please call the Voluntary Assessment Center at (302) 739-6911.

Request Crash Report

To request a crash report, please mail your request to:

Delaware State Police

Traffic Operations Section

P.O. Box 430

Dover, DE 19903

Please include a copy of your collision information exchange form, in addition to your payment. The fee for a standard collision report is $25.00, and the fee for a fatal collision report is $60.00. Payment can be in the form of a check or money order, made payable to the Delaware State Police.

If you have questions about the process to obtain a report, please call (302) 739-5931. Office hours are Monday-Friday from 8am to 4pm.

DelDOT Live Traffic Conditions

http://www.deldot.gov/information/travel_advisory/

Scale House Locations

Information for CDL Drivers

For more information on federal regulations: https://www.fmcsa.dot.gov/

Report Unsafe or Overweight Trucks

To report tips on oversize/overweight trucks please call (302) 378-5230. Please provide, if known, the name of the trucking company, description of the truck, the location of the offense, and the nature of the complaint against the truck.
